title: Uber Clone
description: Uber Clone is a full-stack ride-hailing application inspired by Uber, allowing users to book rides, track drivers in real-time, and manage payments. It includes role-based features for riders and drivers, real-time location tracking, ride history, and secure authentication.

title: Zerodha Clone
description: Zerodha Clone is a full-stack stock trading platform inspired by Zerodha, enabling users to buy and sell stocks, manage portfolios, view real-time market data, and track investment performance. It features secure authentication, role-based dashboards, chart visualizations, and integration with live stock market APIs.
skill: Third-party Stock Market APIs (e.g., Alpha Vantage, Yahoo Finance)
